title: Wahoo and Ernie - Both Sold - They Gone
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Wahoo and Ernie - Both Sold - They Gone
posts.post_content:
A couple of T206 cards are now for sale.

HOFer Sam "Wahoo" Crawford in his throwing pose, graded BVG 2 (looks VG to me), primarily due to corner wear for SOLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10065/crawford-throwing[/IMG]

Southern Leaguer Ernie Howard of the Savannah Indians.  Ernie's pose suggests that he may have an upset stomach.  This ungraded example has left lower and left upper corner creases, but presents well with the Old Mill SL back for  SOLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10796/howard-e-omsl[/IMG]

Wahoo and Ernie want to be a part of your monster.  Don't disappoint them.
